argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rdgfun | |- Fun rec ( F , A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_funres | |- ( Fun rec ( F , A ) -> Fun ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- Fun ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dmres | |- dom ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) = ( _om i^i dom rec ( F , A ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rdgdmlim | |- Lim dom rec ( F , A ) |
| 6 |  | #P_limomss | |- ( Lim dom rec ( F , A ) -> _om C_ dom rec ( F , A ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_ax-mp | |- _om C_ dom rec ( F , A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-ss | |- ( _om C_ dom rec ( F , A ) <-> ( _om i^i dom rec ( F , A ) ) = _om ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpbi | |- ( _om i^i dom rec ( F , A ) ) = _om |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eqtri | |- dom ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) = _om |
| 11 |  | #P_df-fn | |- ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) Fn _om <-> ( Fun ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) /\ dom ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) = _om ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 10, 11 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) Fn _om |
